conflicts.description: ghostscript: Tesseract OCR engine added in 9.53.0
conflicts.name: +tesseract

conflicts.description: ghostscript: Tesseract does not build correctly on macOS
conflicts.name: +tesseract

dependencies.description:
FreeType is a freely available software library to render fonts. It is
written in C, designed to be small, efficient, highly customizable, and
portable while capable of producing high-quality output (glyph images)
of most vector and bitmap font formats.
dependencies.name: freetype

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description:
The GTK+ package contains libraries used for creating graphical user
interfaces for applications.
dependencies.name: gtkplus

dependencies.description:
MozJPEG is a patched version of libjpeg-turbo which improves JPEG
compression efficiency achieving higher visual quality and smaller file
sizes at the same time
dependencies.name: jpeg

dependencies.description:
Little cms is a color management library. Implements fast transforms
between ICC profiles. It is focused on speed, and is portable across
several platforms (MIT license).
dependencies.name: lcms

dependencies.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library.
dependencies.name: libpng

dependencies.description: LibTIFF - Tag Image File Format (TIFF) Library and Utilities.
dependencies.name: libtiff

dependencies.description: libXext - library for common extensions to the X11 protocol.
dependencies.name: libxext

dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.
dependencies.name: pkgconfig

dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.
dependencies.name: zlib-api

dependent_to.description:
GIMP is a cross-platform image editor available for GNU/Linux, macOS,
Windows and more operating systems. It is free software, you can change
its source code and distribute your changes. Whether you are a graphic
designer, photographer, illustrator, or scientist, GIMP provides you
with sophisticated tools to get your job done. You can further enhance
your productivity with GIMP thanks to many customization options and 3rd
party plugins.
dependent_to.name: gimp

dependent_to.description:
GMT (Generic Mapping Tools) is an open source collection of about 80
command-line tools for manipulating geographic and Cartesian data sets
(including filtering, trend fitting, gridding, projecting, etc.) and
producing PostScript illustrations ranging from simple x-y plots via
contour maps to artificially illuminated surfaces and 3D perspective
views.
dependent_to.name: gmt

dependent_to.description:
GraphicsMagick is the swiss army knife of image processing. Provides a
robust and efficient collection of tools and libraries which support
reading, writing, and manipulating an image in over 88 major formats
including important formats like DPX, GIF, JPEG, JPEG-2000, PNG, PDF,
PNM, and TIFF.
dependent_to.name: graphicsmagick

dependent_to.description:
Groff (GNU troff) is a typesetting system that reads plain text mixed
with formatting commands and produces formatted output. Output may be
PostScript or PDF, html, or ASCII/UTF8 for display at the terminal.
dependent_to.name: groff

dependent_to.description:
ImageMagick is a software suite to create, edit, compose, or convert
bitmap images.
dependent_to.name: imagemagick

dependent_to.description:
LaTeX2HTML is a utility that converts LaTeX documents to web pages in
HTML.
dependent_to.name: latex2html

dependent_to.description:
The MEME Suite allows the biologist to discover novel motifs in
collections of unaligned nucleotide or protein sequences, and to perform
a wide variety of other motif-based analyses.
dependent_to.name: meme

dependent_to.description:
Netpbm - graphics tools and converters. A whole bunch of utilities for
primitive manipulation of graphic images. Wide array of converters from
one graphics format to another. E.g. from g3 fax format to jpeg. Many
basic graphics editing tools such as magnifying and cropping.
dependent_to.name: netpbm

dependent_to.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-matplotlib

dependent_to.description:
WebLogo is a web based application designed to make the generation of
sequence logos as easy and painless as possible.
dependent_to.name: py-weblogo

dependent_to.description:
TeX Live is an easy (we hope) way to get up and running with the TeX
document production system. It provides a comprehensive TeX system with
binaries for most flavors of Unix, including GNU/Linux, macOS, and also
Windows. It includes all the major TeX-related programs, macro packages,
and fonts that are free software, including support for many languages
around the world.
dependent_to.name: texlive

dependent_to.description:
WHIZARD is a program system designed for the efficient calculation of
multi-particle scattering cross sections and simulated event samples.
dependent_to.name: whizard

description: An interpreter for the PostScript language and for PDF.
name: ghostscript

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Use the Tesseract library for OCR
variants.name: tesseract
